description:
Overview:

Come join our in-house creator marketing team at eos! In this role, you will be assisting the Creator Marketing Manager in all things creator marketing and serving as an integral part of the team in helping to bring campaigns to life. If you have a passion for creator marketing, social media, and beauty and personal care products, our fast-paced, fun and collaborative environment is for you! This is a contract role for six months with a time commitment of 20 hours per week, with potential for conversion to full-time upon review.


Responsibilities

Assist Creator Marketing Manager in day-to-day tasks related to creator campaigns including:

  • Sourcing creators for upcoming campaigns and evaluating based on brand criteria.
  • Communicating with creators on project details and campaign brief deliverables.
  • Tracking organic performance metrics for live content.
  • Ordering products internally and coordinating the shipping of products to creators.
  • Staying on top of creator and content trends.
  • Partnering with outside agencies on campaign execution when relevant.


Compile and maintain database for creator content including:

  • Pulling creator information from past decks and other collateral and incorporating the information into the database in an organized way.
  • Identifying live links/content files to be included in the database for each piece of creator content.
  • Working closely with the team to fill in any gaps in information.
  • Integrate current database into a more sophisticated platform, partnering with our IT team.


Requirements:

  • 2+ years of relevant experience in influencer/creator marketing with a good understanding of the landscape.
  • Social media expert with deep knowledge of TikTok and Instagram - on the pulse of what’s new and trending.
  • Self-starter: can manage time well, stay organized and meet deadlines.
  • Collaborative worker: is a team player and enjoys collaborating on projects.
  • Detail oriented: strong attention to detail, particularly with data entry.
  • Strong communication skills: comfortable communicating with creator talent and management.
  • Comfortable working in excel (does not need to be an expert but needs basic knowledge).
  • Quick learner: can take direction well and learn new tools/processes quickly.


Company Summary:

eos Products is an iconic global beauty brand that has sold nearly a billion lip balms worldwide. Our company was founded on an innovative and entrepreneurial spirit that revolutionized how people experience daily beauty routines. As a brand of choice among gen z and millennial consumers, eos aims to drive everyday experiences forward, creating the joy that beautifully designed, expertly crafted products can bring to people’s lives. From our iconic lip balm to our cult-eos products create delight where there was once utility, happiness where there was only function.


Equal Opportunity Employer:

eos Products offers equal employment opportunity to qualified individuals without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, age, gender, disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Minorities, women, veterans, and individuals with disabilities are encouraged to apply.
